sentences.english: Coccinellids had the longest temporal niche in wheat fields in both Tacheng and Ili.
sentences.chinese: 瓢蟲類在塔城和伊犁小麥田的時間生態位寬度均較長。

sentences.english: Fruit a berry with sarcocarp segments of pulp vesicles and adaxially attached seeds.
sentences.chinese: 果爲具汁胞的瓢囊瓣的漿果，正面上有種子。

sentences.english: There was fierce competition between spiders and ladybirds on temporal resource.
sentences.chinese: 蜘蛛類和瓢蟲類對時間資源具有較強的競爭作用。

sentences.english: “Naked, plus somebody blammed you in the head, ” says Mom.
sentences.chinese: “光着身子，外加有人把你的頭砸開了瓢，”我媽說。
